thread.title: BRIEF-Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Revises Asset Acquisition Proposal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Revises Asset Acquisition Proposal

organizations.name: zongshen power machinery revises asset acquisition proposal
chongqing zongshen power machinery co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Chongqing Zongshen Power Machinery Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT REVISES ASSET ACQUISITION PROPOSAL TO ACQUIRE EQUIPMENT MANUFACTURING FIRM FOR 950 MILLION YUAN ($148.44 million) VIA CASH Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DoFfqc ; bit.ly/2DqtW0J Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4000 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
